clauses.title: Termination for Convenience
clauses.summary: Either party may terminate with 90 days written notice.

clauses.title: Limitation of Liability
clauses.summary: Total liability is capped at the total fees paid in the preceding 12 months.

clauses.title: Data Privacy
clauses.summary: Both parties must comply with GDPR and CCPA regulations.

insights.message: The liability cap does not explicitly exclude damages from data breaches, creating significant financial risk.
The contract auto-renews for 12-month periods unless cancelled 60 days prior to the expiry date.
Termination notice period of 90 days is standard for an agreement of this scope.

evidence.snippet: ...the total aggregate liability of either party... shall not exceed the total fees paid...
This Agreement shall automatically renew for successive one (1) year terms...
